name: Blooming Light
description:
Play against a friend in this 1v1 game! As the sun, your goal is to help flowers bloom using your light while as the cloud, your goal is to prevent the sun from growing flowers.  This is a very short game that you can play anytime with your friends.

You can move the cloud left and right using A and D.

You can rotate the sun's ray using the left and right arrow keys.
